name: In re ESTATE of Harry E. MILLAR, Deceased

judges: Before EAGEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
POMEROY, former J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
NIX, J., would quash the appeal.
parties: In re ESTATE of Harry E. MILLAR, Deceased.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
O’BRIEN, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
POMEROY, former J., did not participate in the decision of this case.
NIX, J., would quash the appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Michael J. Pepe, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Allan M. Tabas, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
396 A.2d 639
In re ESTATE of Harry E. MILLAR, Deceased.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Oct. 16, 1978.
Decided Jan. 24, 1979.
Michael J. Pepe, Jr., Philadelphia, for appellant.
Allan M. Tabas, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before EAGEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
